name: Legal Help
description: AIDS Legal Referral Panel (ALRP) staff and panel attorneys handle most any type of civil legal issue for clients living within our service area. These include: - Bankruptcy - Credit - Confidentiality - Conservatorship - Contracts - Employee Benefits - Employment - Estate Planning - Family Law - Government Benefits - Housing - Immigration - Insurance - Medical Malpractice - Probate - Real Estate - Tax - Tort - Wills and Powers of Attorney - Workers Compensation

whatTheyOffer: AIDS Legal Referral Panel (ALRP) staff and panel attorneys handle most any type of civil legal issue for clients living within our service area. These include: - Bankruptcy - Credit - Confidentiality - Conservatorship - Contracts - Employee Benefits - Employment - Estate Planning - Family Law - Government Benefits - Housing - Immigration - Insurance - Medical Malpractice - Probate - Real Estate - Tax - Tort - Wills and Powers of Attorney - Workers Compensation
howToGetIt: Call (415) 701-1100. Leave a message. You will receive a return call within 24-48 business hours. If this is a time sensitive matter or you are facing an eviction, please call our general intake line at 415-701-1100 Criminal legal issues are not eligible for our services.
